sematext_region.description: The Sematext region, either US or EU.

billing_plan_id.description: (Required) Plan ID attached to the monitor app in Sematext Cloud.

discount_code.description: (Optional) Iniitial discount code attached to the monitor app in Sematext Cloud.

name.description: (Required) Label for the monitor app in Sematext Cloud.

billing_plan_id.description: (Required) Plan ID attached to the monitor app in Sematext Cloud.

discount_code.description: (Optional) Iniitial discount code attached to the monitor app in Sematext Cloud.

name.description: (Required) Label for the monitor app in Sematext Cloud.

aws_access_key.description:
The access key for retrieval of stats from AWS Cloudwatch. You can retrieve this
from the 'Security & Credentials' section of the AWS console.

aws_fetch_frequency.description: How frequently to fetch metrics. One of MINUTE|FIVE_MINUTES|FIFTEEN_MINUTES

aws_region.description:
The region where AWS operations will take place. Examples
are us-east-1, us-west-2, etc.

aws_secret_key.description:
The secret key for retrieval of stats from AWS Cloudwatch. You can retrieve this
from the 'Security & Credentials' section of the AWS console.

billing_plan_id.description: (Required) Plan ID attached to the monitor app in Sematext Cloud.

discount_code.description: (Optional) Iniitial discount code attached to the monitor app in Sematext Cloud.
